alert.note: Alert for Aitkin; Crow Wing (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 9:34AM CDT until further notice by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Mississippi River At Aitkin affecting Crow Wing and Aitkin Counties. .High water and flooding continues this week along the Mississippi River. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and remains forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River At Aitkin. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, the boat ramp at Aitkin city park floods. A few driveways become covered with water in the Cedarbrook area. Minor flooding of farmland occurs in the Cedarbrook community. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 14.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 AM CDT Saturday was 14.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to continue to fall through the weekend and into early next week. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood safety information can be found at www.weather.gov/safety/flood. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Mississippi River Aitkin 13.0 14.2 Sat 8 am CDT 14.0 13.9 13.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. More information and resources about spring flooding is available at www.weather.gov/duluth/spring-flooding. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning by 1100 AM CDT.
